pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.exception.handler

Class AuthorizationExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.exception.handler.AuthorizationExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionExceptionHandler<AuthorizationException>

    public class AuthorizationExceptionHandler
extends Object
implements ActionExceptionHandler<AuthorizationException>
    This handler prepares AuthorizationExceptionResponse exception response.

    • Method Detail

      • handleException

        public Object handleException(AuthorizationException exception,
                     ActionExecutionContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ActionExceptionHandler
        Handles occurring exception. Returned object will be serialized and sent as the response. Although this method may return objects of any type, it is recommended to return ExceptionResponse (or its subclasses), as this type is recognised by Action Controller (special exception response is sent when ExceptionResponse object is returned).
        Specified by:
        handleException in interface ActionExceptionHandler<AuthorizationException>
        Parameters:
        exception - exception thrown during action execution.
        context - current action invocation context.
        Returns:
        Response object that will be sent back to client. ExceptionResponse is recommended.
        See Also:
        ExceptionResponse

      • getHandledStages

        public ActionExecutionStage[] getHandledStages()
        Description copied from interface: ActionExceptionHandler
        Points out action stages in which this exception handler operates. Even if exception type matches parameter type of given handler, exception won't be processed if occurred in action stage not listed in this method.
        Specified by:
        getHandledStages in interface ActionExceptionHandler<AuthorizationException>
        Returns:
        action execution stages covered by this action exception handler.
